summary: This mod adds weightless Thalmor items that take up all 7 slots, that means that the hood and robe are separate and can be worn with any circlet, gloves, boots, ring or necklace (ALL ARE INCLUDED!)
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds weightless Thalmor items that take up all 7 slots, that means that the hood and robe are separate and can be worn with any circlet, gloves, boots, ring or necklace (ALL ARE INCLUDED!)

they are in a small dwemer chest in a bush in front of the whiterun carriage.
author: yamslunch
